item.title: Report X-2025010852
item.description:
Report X-2025010852

Identified by scraper @ 2025-01-23T21:13:01+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2025-01-16
  • City: SOMERVILLE
  • State: MA
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: INSPECTED ONE AIR PACKAGE DUE TO THE SOUND OF DRY ICE PELLETS ROLLING AROUND INSIDE THE BOX. UPON INSPECTION OF THE CONTENTS DISCOVERED APPROXIMATELY THREE POUNDS OF DRY ICE COOLING DIAGNOSTIC MATERIALS. THERE ARE NO DANGEROUS GOODS MARKS OR LABELS ON THE OUTER BOX. THIS PACKAGE HAS NOT BEEN ACCEPTED FOR AIR OR TRANSPORTED IN THE AIR BY UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO.
